items.paragraph_text:
Reliable Elevator Circuit Breaker MCB 63A 4P

The Elevator Circuit Breaker MCB 63A 4P is designed to protect three-phase elevator circuits with a neutral line from electrical faults. This compact yet powerful miniature circuit breaker (MCB) automatically interrupts the current flow during overloads or short circuits, preventing damage to elevator wiring, control panels, and other electrical components.

Featuring a 4-pole (4P) design, the MCB 63A 4P ensures simultaneous disconnection of all three phases and the neutral, providing complete safety during faults. Its thermal-magnetic trip mechanism offers reliable protection under varying electrical loads, making it ideal for modern elevator systems and other heavy-duty applications requiring precise electrical safety.

Key Specifications

  • Model: MCB 63A 4P
  • Function: Overcurrent Protection
  • Poles: 4P (Three-Phase + Neutral)
  • Mechanism: Thermal-Magnetic Trip
  • Application: Elevator Control Panels, Heavy-Duty Electrical Circuits
  • Compatible Brands: OTIS / SIGMA / FUJI / MITSUBISHI / KONE
